author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
Culture

PN Raghavendra Rao Memorial Trust: Purandaradasar Aradhana, Purandaradasar Kalaiarangam, 8 a.m.; 6.30 p.m.

General

GKNM Hospital: Diabetic foot care and treatment clinic, 2 p.m.

Karpagam Academy of Higher Education: CEO Meet, 10 a.m.

Yellow Tree Academy: Interaction with Maltesh Mattennavar and Dan Smith of Rockstar, RHR Hotels, 9.30 a.m.

GR Damodaran Academy of Management: Inauguration of entrepreneurship week, 10.15 a.m.

Coimbatore Management Association: Talk by B.V. Cadambi, management consultant, CMA Hall, 6 p.m.

Poompuhar: Crafts mela, Meenakshi Hall, 10 a.m.

Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry: Meeting, Chamber Towers, 6.30 p.m.

Lions Club of Coimbatore Ramnagar: Blood donation camp, St. Pauls Women’s College of Arts and Science, 9.30 a.m.

Environment Conservation Group: First phase of Project Path, “Workshop on Road Will – A Road Blocking The Way”, Rajiv K. Srivasatava, Additional Principal Chief Conservator of Forests and Director of Tamil Nadu Forest Academy, I. Anwardeen - Conservator of Forests – Coimbatore circle, K.S. Sundaraman – Executive Director of Shivatex and D. Boominathan, Landscape Co-ordinator of WWF speak, Tamil Nadu Forest Academy, Forest College Campus, Cowley Brown Road, 9.30 a.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore.
